docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECTION_DS1074Z node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible DS1000Z oscilloscopes
docstring.short_description: The DIGITAL_ON_OFF_DS1074Z node turns digital channels on or off for the DS1074Z.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DS1074Z node).

parameters.name: digi_on_off
parameters.description: Turn digital channel (i.e. LA) on the scope on or off.

parameters.name: d0
parameters.description: Turn digital channel 0 on or off.

parameters.name: d1
parameters.description: Turn digital channel 1 on or off.

parameters.name: d2
parameters.description: Turn digital channel 2 on or off.

parameters.name: d3
parameters.description: Turn digital channel 3 on or off.

parameters.name: use_pods
parameters.description: Use pod1 and pod2 parameters? If True, d0-d3 parameters are not used.

parameters.name: pod1
parameters.description: Turn digital channels 0-7 on or off.

parameters.name: pod2
parameters.description: Turn digital channels 8-15 on or off.
